name: Daisy Filigree
description:
Celebrate spring anytime of year with this elegant handcrafted blank note card.  A Swarovski crystal adorns the center of an authentic miniature daisy. The underlying printed filigree design provides the perfect background for layering green and lavender color panels.  Ideal for any occasion.
Flat printing 
80% post consumer fibers and mixed sources
Card: 3 1/2" x 5" Envelope: 3 5/8" x 5 1/8"
Ships in protective clear envelope.
ENJOY COMPLIMENTARY STANDARD SHIPPING.

name: Larkspur Filigree
description:
Style Number: SF02
Name: Larkspur Filigree
Price: $8
Description:
What better way is there to say thank you?  This beautiful handcrafted thank you note is fashioned with an authentic pink larkspur as the focal point, with a sparkling pink Swarovski crystal to accent its center.  The printed filigree design and paper layering in celadon green creates a truly unique way to show someone your appreciation.   
Flat printing 
80% post consumer fibers and mixed sources
Card: 3 1/2" x 5" Envelope: 3 5/8" x 5 1/8"
Ships in protective clear envelope.
ENJOY COMPLIMENTARY STANDARD SHIPPING.

name: Mod Petal Set
description:
A set of six note cards in two designs from the Mod Petal Collection. Yellow larkspur and hydrangea create one-of-a-kind note cards.  The hand pressed flowers appear to dance on their graphic floral stems. Perfect for any occasion, the natural beauty of this black, white and yellow design will reflect your clean sense of style. Real flowers and the handcrafted process of this design give each note card its one-of-a kind distinction and charm. Ships in protective clear box.
Flat printing 
80% post consumer fibers
Card: 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" Envelope: 4 3/8" x 5 3/4"
ENJOY COMPLIMENTARY STANDARD SHIPPING.

name: Mod Petal Box Set
description:
Style Number: MP10
Name: Mod Petal Box Set
Description:$79.95
The gift that keeps on giving!  Ten cards with 2 designs from The Mod Petal Collection are presented beautifully in this hinged keepsake box covered in luxurious black textured fabric.  The hand pressed flowers appear to dance on their graphic floral stems. Perfect for any occasion, the natural beauty of this black, white and yellow design will reflect your clean sense of style. Real flowers and the handcrafted process of this design give each note card its one-of-a-kind distinction and charm.  Closed, the box makes a stunning addition to any desk.  When opened, the recipient will think of you whenever they write a card.
Flat printing 
80% post consumer fibers
Card: 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" Envelope: 4 3/8" x 5 3/4"
Keepsake Box: 9 1/2"W x 6 1/2"D x 2 1/2"H
ENJOY COMPLIMENTARY STANDARD SHIPPING.

name: The Perfect Steeper
description:
"Perfect Steeper" is a portable loose tea brewer by Eight Cranes. Design features double-walled chambers and an 8 ounce tumbler all in one attractive unit.

■Portable high tempered glass loose leaf tea brewer 
■Easily brew high quality tea without the mess 
■Makes up to 6 servings per teaspoon 
■Keeps loose leaf tea and water separated with a unique design 
■Versatile, use at home at the office or on the go 

ENJOY COMPLIMENTARY STANDARD SHIPPING.
Shipping Details:
 - 3 x 3 x 10 inches
 - Shipping Weight: 2 pounds
